api.lib.layers package

Package contents

Layers root package.

Contains following modules:

Modules:

  • base: contains base layer class

  • linear: contains implementation of Linear(Fully Connected) layer

Modules

api.lib.layers.base module

Contains implementation of base layer class

class api.lib.layers.base.Layer

Bases: object

Base layer class.

forward(input_, *args, **kwargs)

Calculate output of the layer.

Parameters

input – input data

api.lib.layers.linear module

Contains implementation of Linear layer

class api.lib.layers.linear.Linear(size=(1, 1), activation_function=None, weight_initializer=None)

Bases: Layer

Linear (or Fully Connected) layer.

Parameters

  • size – input data size, defaults to (1, 1)

  • activation_function – activation function, defaults to None

  • weight_initializer – function used to initialize the weights and biases, defaults to None

forward(data, *args, **kwargs)

Calculate output of the layer.

Parameters

data – input data
